about_the_game:
Mutant Crawl Classics #1: Hive of the Overmind

A Level 0 Adventure for MCC RPG Younglings on their Rite of Passage are shocked to regain consciousness with no memory of how they came to be in a gigantic insect hive far to the north of their homelands, laboring as drone-slaves of the savage ant-men. In a land where an "insect revolution" has taken place, the PCs must contend with insectoid mega fauna and a maze-like underground installation before facing the ominous Overmind: a building-sized insect queen cybernetically linked to an ancient chaotic AI.
Rules Set: MCC RPG (also compatible with DCC RPG)
Written by: Julian BernickCover Art: Stefan Poag
GMG6211, 16 pages
